TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Activity extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Activity extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示具有要用于日志记录的上下文的操作。

span.span: Represents an operation with context to be used for logging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Activity`包含操作名称、ID、开始时间和持续时间、标记和行李。An `Activity` has an operation name, an ID, a start time and duration, tags, and baggage. 当前活动可以通过静态 属性访问。The current activity can be accessed with the static property. 应通过调用构造函数来创建活动，并根据需要进行配置，然后使用 方法（该方法维护活动和集的父子关系）启动 。Activities should be created by calling the constructor, configured as necessary, and then started with the method, which maintains parent-child relationships for the activities and sets . 活动完成后，应使用 方法停止。When an activity is finished, it should be stopped with the method. 没有 `Activity` 方法允许将异常转义为对错误输入的响应。No `Activity` methods allow exceptions to escape as a response to bad inputs. 将引发和捕获它们 (这允许调试器和监视器查看错误) ，但异常被取消，并且操作具有合理的 (通常不执行任何) 。They are thrown and caught (which allows debuggers and monitors to see the error), but the exception is suppressed, and the operation does something reasonable (typically it does nothing).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string operationName) cil managed

span.span: The name of the operation.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意， 具有 "生成器" 模式：调用构造函数、多个 `Set*` 和 `Add*` api，然后调用 来生成活动。Note that has a "builder" pattern: you call the constructor, a number of `Set*` and `Add*` APIs, and then call to build the activity. **must** 使用新实例之前，必须调用。You **must** call before using the new instance.

for convenient chaining.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此键/值对包含在由属性返回的集合中 ，还可由 方法检索。This key/value pair is included in the collection returned by the property, and can also be retrieved by the method. `Baggage` 适用于运行时控制所需的信息。`Baggage` is meant for information that is needed for runtime control. 有关在日志中显示的有用信息 ，请使用 属性。For information that is useful to show up in the log with the , use the property.

summary.span: 将指定的活动事件添加到事件列表。

span.span: Adds the specified activity event to the events list.
for convenient chaining.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AddEvent` 不用于长时间添加多个事件，因为事件对象存储在内存中。`AddEvent` is not intended for adding many events over a long period of time, because the event objects are stored in memory. 将太多事件添加到同一个 `Activity` 对象可能会影响应用性能。Adding too many events to the same `Activity` object can impact app performance. 调用方应限制添加到同一个对象的事件数 `Activity` ，或选择其他日志记录机制，例如 。Callers should either restrict the number of events added to the same `Activity` object or choose another logging mechanism, for example, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Baggage` 当请求使进程 (与 ID) 一起保留时，将序列化。`Baggage` is serialized when requests leave the process (along with the ID). 通常， `Baggage` 用于精细控制活动和任何子项的日志记录。Typically, `Baggage` is used for fine-grained control over logging of the activity and any children. 通常，如果在运行时不使用数据，则应 改用。In general, if you are not using the data at runtime, you should be using instead.

span.span: Gets or sets the default ID format for the .

remarks.format: `Activity`实例尝试对 id 使用与父实例相同的格式。The `Activity` instance tries to use the same format for IDs as its parent. 如果活动没有父级，则此属性将确定要使用的默认格式。If the activity has no parent, this property determines the default format to use. 在 .NET 5.0 和更高版本中，默认格式为 。In .NET 5.0 and later, the default format is . 在以前的版本中，默认格式为 。In previous versions, the default format is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DisplayName` 用于在用户界面中使用，不需要与相同 `OperationName` 。`DisplayName` is intended to be used in a user interface and need not be the same as `OperationName`. 如果 `DisplayName` 未设置该属性，它将返回与相同的值 `OperationName` 。If the `DisplayName` property is not set, it will return the same value as `OperationName`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ID 具有层次结构： `root-id.id1_id2.id3_` 。An ID has a hierarchical structure: `root-id.id1_id2.id3_`. 当 通过向或附加后缀来调用时，将生成 ID `Activity.Parent.Id` 。The ID is generated when is called by appending a suffix to the `Activity.Parent.Id` or the . 在 开始之前没有 ID。An has no ID until it starts. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Id 格式](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/src/libraries/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format)。For more information, see [Id Format](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/src/libraries/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format).

span.span: if the activity should be populated; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 库作者的最佳做法不尝试设置此属性。The best practice for the library authors is not try to set this property. 创建活动时，将自动设置此属性。This property is automatically set when creating the Activity. 只有在使用活动构造函数创建了活动对象并希望重写默认值的情况下，setter 才有用。The setter is useful only in the case of Activity objects created using the Activity constructor and want to override the default value. 使用自动创建的活动对象 会将此属性设置为正确的值。Activity objects created using automatically have this property set to the right value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作名称是适用于分组/筛选的 *益处* 名称。An operation name is the *coarsest* name that is useful for grouping/filtering. 该名称通常是编译时常量。The name is typically a compile-time constant. Rest Api 的名称是合理的，但参数 (例如特定帐户) 不应在名称中，而应在标记中。Names of Rest APIs are reasonable, but arguments (such as specific accounts) should not be in the name but rather in the tags.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.Activity SetTag (string key, object? value);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Diagnostics.Activity SetTag(string key, object value) cil managed
Public Function SetTag (key As String, value As Object) As Activity
public: System::Diagnostics::Activity ^ SetTag(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The tag key name.

param.name: value
param.span: 映射到输入键的标记值。

span.span: The tag value mapped to the input key.

summary.span: 使用输入键和值添加或更新活动标记。

span.span: Adds or update the activity tag with the input key and value.
for convenient chaining.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 如果输入值为 `null` ：If the input value is `null`: - 如果集合中有任何标记具有相同的键，则将从集合中删除此标记。If the collection has any tag with the same key, then this tag will get removed from the collection. - 否则，将不会发生任何情况，并且集合不会更改。Otherwise, nothing will happen and the collection will not change. - 如果输入值不是 `null` ：If the input value is not `null`: - 如果集合中有任何标记具有相同的键，则映射到此项的值将更新为新的输入值。If the collection has any tag with the same key, then the value mapped to this key will get updated with the new input value. - 否则，键和值将作为新标记添加到集合中。Otherwise, the key and value will get added as a new tag to the collection.

summary.span: 获取与此活动关联的活动源。

span.span: Gets the activity source associated with this activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从公共构造函数创建的所有活动都将具有一个单一源，其中源名称为空字符串。All activities created from public constructors will have a singleton source where the source name is an empty string. 否则，源将保存通过创建活动的对象 。Otherwise, the source will hold the object that created the activity through .

summary.span: 获取键/值对的集合，这些键/值对表示将与 一起记录到日志系统的信息。

span.span: Gets a collection of key/value pairs that represent information that will be logged along with the to the logging system.

value.span: 将随一起记录 到日志记录系统的信息。

span.span: Information that will be logged along with the to the logging system.

remarks.span: 在 .NET 5.0 和更高版本中，列表中标记的顺序与它们添加到列表中的顺序一致。

span.span: In .NET 5.0 and later versions, the order of the tags in the list matches the order in which they're added to the list.

remarks.span: 在以前的版本中，将反转顺序，即，添加的第一个项是列表中的最后一项。

span.span: In previous versions, the order is reversed, that is, the first item added is last in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TraceStateString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TraceStateString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 W3C 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets the W3C header.

value.span: W3C 标头。

span.span: The W3C header.

remarks.format: `tracestate`标头用于携带补充信息来跟踪包含在跟踪父级中的标识。The `tracestate` header is intended to carry supplemental information to trace identity contained in the trace parent. `tracestate` 包含键/值对的列表，这些键/值对在多个分布式跟踪关系图中传达有关请求位置的信息。`tracestate` consists of a list of key/value pairs that convey information about the request position in multiple distributed tracing graphs. 此信息通常由分布式跟踪系统使用，不应用于常规用途行李，因为这可能会破坏分布式跟踪的相关性。This information is typically used by distributed tracing systems and should not be used for general purpose baggage, since this may break the correlation of a distributed trace. 逻辑上 `TraceStateString` 只是一种行李 (如果流类似于行李) ，但由于它应采用特殊大小写方式 (它有自己的 HTTP 标头) ，如果不 lumped 其他行李，则更方便/高效。Logically `TraceStateString` is just a kind of baggage (if flows just like baggage), but because it is expected to be special-cased (it has its own HTTP header), it is more convenient/efficient if it is not lumped in with other baggage.
